arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}{Combat Effect Chance}%{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} Minimum {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} increased by {c_number}[{SF_7}|+|]{/c}.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Unleash a savage roar, causing each of your attacks to trigger an additional {c_number}{payload:IMPACT}{/c} damage strike per enemy for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_MAIN}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Ravager's{/c} duration is extended by {c_number}[{SF_4}]{/c} seconds per kill while active. This bonus is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_6}|2|]{/c} each kill, to a minimum of {c_number}[{SF_5}|2|]{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}Ravager{/c} is active, your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills instantly dash to your target and all Vigor Generation is increased by {c_number}[{SF_19}*100|%x|]{/c}.

{c_important}Ravager{/c} passively stockpiles any Healing you receive up to {c_number}{SF_21}{/c} stacks. While active, {c_important}Ravager{/c} spends stacks to strike Elite enemies up to an additional {c_number}[({SF_20}*4)-1]{/c} times.
